decks.notes: The deck revolves around utilizing board wipes, counterspells, and removal spells to control the game and prevent opponents from developing their board state. With a focus on disruption and controlling the tempo of the game, cards like Wrath of God, Negate, Path to Exile, and Cryptic Command are used to remove threats and protect Narset, Enlightened Master. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Elspeth, Sun's Champion for additional card advantage and win conditions. Narset Transcendent and Time Warp effects provide extra turns and card advantage to stay ahead and eventually take over the game through incremental advantage.

The key concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing Brago, King Eternal's ability to blink powerful creatures and permanents, such as Glen Elendra Archmage and Parallax Wave, to disrupt opponents' plans and generate value. The deck includes a variety of counterspells and removal spells to protect Brago and maintain board control. Additionally, the deck includes efficient card draw and selection spells like Preordain and Brainstorm to ensure consistency and find key pieces. The deck's win condition revolves around setting up a soft lock with cards like Gideon Jura and True-Name Nemesis while slowly wearing down opponents with incremental advantage and powerful threats like Batterskull and Umezawa's Jitte.

The main idea of this deck is to swarm the board with goblin creatures and utilize their tribal synergies to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive tactics. Krenko, Mob Boss acts as the commander, creating a multitude of goblin tokens to fuel the deck's strategy. Cards like Shared Animosity and Coat of Arms boost the power of the goblin army, while Purphoros, God of the Forge and Impact Tremors provide additional damage output. The deck also includes disruption elements like Blood Moon and Goblin Grenade to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to flood the battlefield with goblins, buff them up, and attack aggressively to secure victory in the 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

The deck revolves around using Titania's ability to turn land sacrifice into an advantage by ramping up quickly and overwhelming the opponent with a wide array of threats. The deck focuses on utilizing land-based ramp spells to quickly accelerate mana production, while also utilizing recursion effects like Life from the Loam and Crucible of Worlds to ensure a steady flow of land drops. Cards like Garruk, Primal Hunter and Avenger of Zendikar provide additional value by generating tokens to pressure the opponent. Through efficient use of land-based synergies and a diverse range of threats, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and overwhelm opponents with a relentless stream of threats.

The focus of this deck is to create a strong aggressive strategy using Doran, the Siege Tower as the commander. The deck includes a mix of removal spells, hand disruption, and versatile creatures to control the board and apply pressure to the opponent. With a combination of efficient removal spells like Path to Exile and Swords to Plowshares, along with creatures like Tarmogoyf and Siege Rhino, the deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total. Additionally, the deck includes powerful cards like Liliana of the Veil and Umezawa's Jitte to further disrupt the opponent's game plan and provide additional advantage. Overall, the deck is designed to play aggressively and efficiently to secure a victory.

The deck revolves around creating a token army with Prossh, Skyraider of Kher and utilizing various combo pieces to generate value and win the game. It includes a variety of mana dorks to ramp up, along with powerful enchantments like Impact Tremors and Beastmaster Ascension to enhance the tokens created by Prossh. The deck also includes sacrifice outlets like Goblin Bombardment and Zulaport Cutthroat to capitalize on sacrificing tokens for value. Additionally, it utilizes powerful creatures like Purphoros, God of the Forge and Xenagos, God of Revels to maximize damage output and close out games quickly. The deck focuses on creating a strong board presence and overwhelming the opponent with its combo potential.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct burn spells, aiming to deal damage quickly and efficiently. With Zurgo Bellstriker as the commander, the deck includes a variety of low-cost creatures with haste and abilities that punish the opponent for playing spells, as well as a wide range of burn spells to finish off the opponent or clear the way for attacks. The deck prioritizes speed and consistency, utilizing a high number of Mountains for mana efficiency and including powerful red cards like Lightning Bolt, Sulfuric Vortex, and Hellrider to push through damage and secure victories in a fast-paced 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.

This aggressive Zurgo Bellstriker deck is designed to quickly deal damage to the opponent and put pressure on them from the very beginning of the game. With a mix of direct damage spells, efficient creatures, and enchantments that punish opponents for playing noncreature spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. By keeping the pressure on with hasty creatures and burn spells, the deck can quickly reduce the opponent's life total to zero and secure a victory. The strategy focuses on speed, efficiency, and constant aggression to keep the opponent on the back foot and unable to mount a strong defense.
